Module teaGearPlanner
Package main

Class Json

java.lang.Object
main.Json
public class Json
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains a list of methods used for serializing and deserializing content from and to files

This method uses the Gson resource to generate JSON files

Since:
1.0.0
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Tealeaf

    • deserialize

      public static java.lang.Object deserialize​(java.lang.String json, boolean isStatic, java.lang.reflect.Type cls)
      Deserializes an object from a JSON representation
      Parameters:
      json - JSON representation of the object to deserialize
      isStatic - Whether or not to deserialize static fields
      cls - Class of object to deserialize, ex: Settings.class
      Returns:
      Deserialized Object represented in the JSON
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • deserialize

      public static java.lang.Object deserialize​(java.io.BufferedReader reader, boolean isStatic, java.lang.reflect.Type cls)
      Deserializes an object from a JSON representation
      Parameters:
      reader - Reader of JSON representative of the object
      isStatic - Whether or not to deserialize static fields
      cls - Class of object to deserialize, ex: Settings.class
      Returns:
      Deserialized Object represented in the JSON
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • getFile

      public static java.io.File getFile​(java.lang.String... path)
      Gets the file from a path, starting in a given application directory

      Note: This will return the file, whether or not it exists

      Parameters:
      path - Path within the application directory
      Returns:
      File with the given path
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • saveObject

      public static void saveObject​(java.lang.Object src, boolean isStatic, java.lang.String... path)
      Saves an object as a JSON into a file
      Parameters:
      src - Object to save into the file
      isStatic - Whether or not to include static fields
      path - Path within the application directory to save the file
      Since:
      1.0.0
